291675.「ここは アクセサリー強化屋です。\n 今日は どんなご用ですか？\n<sele:
This is the Accessory Enhancement shop. How
can I help you today?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects
Reapply Effects
Explanation
<select_end><break>

291676.「他に 用はありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n効果を付ける\n効:
Anything else you need?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects
Reapply Effects
Explanation
<select_end><break>

291677.「効果を付けたい断罪のゆびわは どれですか？\n<break>: Which ring do you want to add effects to?<break>

291678.「何を付けるか 選んでください。\n<break>:
Choose the type of effect that you want.
<break>

291679.「この中から 付けたい効果を\n 選んでください。\n<break>:
Select the effect you wish to apply from the
list.<break>

291680.「この断罪のゆびわには これ以上\n 効果を付けられないの……。\n 別のゆびわ:
I can't add any more effects to this ring...
Please choose another one.<bw_break>

291681.「この断罪のゆびわは ロックされてます。\n ……本当に 効果を付けても いいの:
This ring is locked. Do you still want to
put effects on it?<yesno_2><break>

291682.「必要な素材が 足りないようです。\n<bw_break>: It seems you don't have enough materials.<bw_break>

291683.「……あっ ひとつのゆびわに 同じ効果を\n ふたつ以上 付けることはできないの:
...Oh, you can't have more than one of the
same effect on this ring. Please choose
another effect.<bw_break>

291684.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>ですね。\n 必要な素材を 消費して\n 効果を:
Do you want me to use the necessary
materials and add the
<%sL_ADD_KOUKA> effect?
<yesno_2><break>

291686.「効果を強化したい\n 断罪のゆびわは どれですか？\n<break>:
Which Judgment Ring would you like to enhance?
<break>

291687.「強化したい効果を 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please choose the effect that you want to
boost.
<break>

291688.「この断罪のゆびわには まだ\n ひとつも 効果が付いてないです……。\n 別の:
That ring doesn't have any effects
on it yet... Please choose another one.
<bw_break>

291689.「この断罪のゆびわは ロックされてます。\n ……本当に 効果を強化しても いい:
That Judgment Ring is locked. Are you sure
it's okay to boost its effects?
<yesno_2><break>

291690.「<%sL_GROW_KOUKA>ですね。\n 必要な素材を 消費して\n 効果:
<%sL_GROW_KOUKA> is what you'd like?
I'll use the necessary materials to boost
this effect.
<yesno_2><break>

291692.「効果を付け直したい\n 断罪のゆびわは どれですか？\n ３つの効果が 付いて:
Which Judgment Ring would you like to change?
Please choose one of its three effects.
<break>

291693.「付け直したい効果を 選んでください。\n<break>: Select the effect you want to reapply.<break>

291694.「この中から どの効果に付け直すか\n 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please choose which of these effects you
would like to reattach.<break>

291695.「この断罪のゆびわは ロックされてます。\n ……別のゆびわを選んでください。\:
That Judgment Ring is locked. Please choose
another one.
<bw_break>

291696.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>ですね。\n 必要な素材を 消費して\n 効果を:
<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>? I'll consume the necessary
materials and reapply the effect. Okay?
<yesno_2><break>

291697.「今 付いている効果を 付けるために\n 使った素材は 戻ってこないけど\n …:
You won't get back the materials used to apply
the original effect. Are you sure you want to
reapply it?
<yesno_2><break>

291699.「ここでは 断罪のゆびわに\n キミの望む 効果を付けられるの。\n ゆびわ自体:
Here, you can add the effect you want to the decisive ring. You can get the ring itself from Mr. Millery. To add an effect to the
ring of absolution, you will need to pay for the necessary materials. Don't worry, you don't need gold. You can add three effects
in total, but you cannot add more than two of the same effect. You can also reapply an effect that you have already applied. But be
careful, you will lose all the materials you used for the effect.

291700.「私でよかったら いつでも お手伝いします。\n 用がある時は 声をかけてくださ:
I'm always happy to help if you'd like me
to. Please give me a call if you need me.<end>

291701.「……えっと その効果は\n これ以上 強化させられないの。\n 別の効果を 選:
Um, sorry... but that effect can't be boosted
any further. Please choose another effect.
<bw_break>

291702.「こんにちは。ここは特別なアクセサリーに\n キミの望む効果を 付ける事ができる:
Hello! Here you can add the effects that you
desire to special accessories. Now then...
<bw_break>

292110.「うーん 対象の断罪のゆびわを\n 持っていないみたいです。\n<end>:
Hmmm... it seems that you don't have a
Judgment Ring.
<end>

292325.「うーん それは今ついているものと\n 同じ効果みたいです。\n<bw_brea:
Hmmm...that seems to have the same effect as
the one that's on now.<bw_break>

294608.「うーん ３つの効果が付いている\n 断罪のゆびわから 選んでください。\n<b:
Hmmm... please choose a Judgment Ring with
three effects.
<bw_break>

301977.「ここでは 断罪のゆびわに\n キミの望む 効果を付けられるの。\n ゆびわ自体:
Here, you can add effects to the Judgment Ring as you wish. The ring itself is given to you by Mr. Millery, and in order to add the effect
to the Judgment Ring, you will need to pay for the necessary materials. You don't need to pay gold for it. You can add three effects to the
Judgment Ring, but you cannot add more than two of the same effect. You can also enhance the effects you have added. You can also
enhance the effects you have added. But you don't need gold as well. You can also reapply an effect that you have already added. But be
careful, because you will lose all the materials you used for the effect...

301978.「ここは アクセサリー強化屋です。\n 今日は どんなご用ですか？\n<sele:
This is the Accessory Enhancement shop. How
can I help you today?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects
Boost Effects
Reapply Effects
Explanation
<select_end><break>

301979.「他に 用はありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n効果を付ける\n効:
Anything else I can do for you?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects
Boost Effects
Reapply Effects
Explanation
<select_end><break>

302854.「……あっ キミが来るのを 待っていました。\n 私 断罪のゆびわに 付いている:
Ah, I'm glad you came. I can now boost any existing effects on your Judgment Ring!
It requires a new type of material, but if you find any, please bring it here. Now then...
